title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects I don't understand it.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy for a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when viewing the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project. Additionally, I would like to know the meaning of the error message.
SR: To reproduce this issue, open a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant) and try to view the scoped type hierarchy. Note the error message that appears and the absence of class hierarchies of internal jars.
